name: Ten Second Helpings
description:
Hello, I am Genyie!

This is my first GameJam and actually the first game I have ever fully completed since starting learning game design a year ago so forgive me for any bugs or awkward-looking game play.

All the game play and assets are done by me, I have been learning to draw overtime so the drawing could be better but for the moment I think it came out well!

The game was made for the Geta Game Jam under the theme of "Ten Seconds" so I took it literally and conceived a game based on letting a child eat more and more second helpings until he is full!

In this game you control a child who isn't full after eating his meal from his parents and wants a lot more to eat, "Ten Second Helpings" to be exact. Use the space bar to eat a second helping and try to avoid your parents eyesight or else you will be caught and have to start over! Beat the first five levels to win the game and satiate Bill's hunger!

Thank you for playing!
